thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One night getaway
thread.title_full: One night getaway - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: calogerod302
title: One night getaway
text:
Perfect and relaxing in central London. We stayed for a Friday night showing here given its close proximity to the Royal Albert Hall (15 min walk)
A lovely hotel we stayed in the King room with a quiet garden view and club lounge access. Well worth the extra money for the lounge treats alone.
We also had lunch in the restuarant Onami which was fantastic asian dining.
Will stay again if in the Kensington area and repeat the whole process
